item.title: EP 113 - The School Shooter/Pedophile Connection
item.itunes:title: The School Shooter/Pedophile Connection
item.description:
Today we take a quick look at the first fatality connected to a UFO encounter, visit a philosopher with a knack for pissing people off, and then we examine whether there is a connection between child molesters and mass shooters.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Captain Thomas Mantell took his fighter jet in a pursuit against a UFO. The official story was it was simply a Skyhook balloon. UFOlogists believe in something underworldly. Either way, Captain Mantell lost his life in the first fatal UFO encounter.

Then we look at Diogenes, famous philosopher, professional troll, and all around bum. His teachings are often out shadowed by the way weird he lived his life, but in the end they are both intertwined to show people that sometimes simple is better.

And finally we look at the possible connection between mass shooters and pedophiles.

Links:

Mantell UFO incident

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mantell_UFO_incident

THE MANTELL UFO INCIDENT

http://www.legacy.com/news/culture-and-trends/article/the-mantell-ufo-incident

MANTELL CASE - 1948

https://www.mufon.com/mantell-case---1948.html

The Thomas Mantell UFO Incident

https://science.howstuffworks.com/space/aliens-ufos/ufo-government3.htm

Diogenes

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diogenes

Diogenes of Sinope

https://en.wikiquote.org/wiki/Diogenes_of_Sinope

Diogenes of Sinope, the philosopher troll

https://medium.com/@mustaphahitani/diogenes-of-sinope-the-philosopher-troll-a01e1fc4eb08

The Cynics and Diogenes, the Philosopher who Lived in a Barrel

http://decodedpast.com/cynics-diogenes-philosopher-lived-barrel/14606

Diogenes of Sinope

https://www.iep.utm.edu/diogsino/

Diogenes

https://www.britannica.com/biography/Diogenes-Greek-philosopher

Diogenes, The Dog-Like Philosopher

https://www.headstuff.org/culture/history/history-of-europe/diogenes-dog-like-philosopher/

Love: Public Libraries Home for Masturbation

https://dc.uwm.edu/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?article=1199&context=orland_park_library_challenge

Sandy Hook shooting: FBI files reveal mass killer Adam Lanza had paedophilic interest in children

https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/sandy-hook-massacre-adam-lanza-paedophilia-fbi-files-mass-shooting-newtown-elementary-school-a8018566.html

NEWTOWN SCHOOL SHOOTER ADAM LANZA WAS PEDOPHILE WHO WANTED TO ‘SAVE’ KIDS, NEW FBI DOCUMENTS SAY

https://www.newsweek.com/fbi-sandy-hook-gunman-chose-elementary-school-because-he-was-pedophile-691817

Adam Lanza and Stephen Paddock Prove These Shocking Traits Are Common in Mass Shooters

https://www.cheatsheet.com/culture/adam-lanza-and-stephen-paddock-prove-these-shocking-traits-are-common-in-mass-shooters.html/

FBI documents reveal Newtown shooter Adam Lanza's pedophilia interest

https://www.cnn.com/2017/10/25/us/sandy-hook-adam-lanza-unsealed-docs/index.html

Computer evidence shows Lanza's interest in pedophilia

https://www.ctpost.com/local/article/Computer-evidence-shows-Lanza-s-interest-in-5156605.php

Las Vegas shooter Stephen Paddock's brother Bruce arrested for child porn

https://www.cbsnews.com/news/bruce-paddock-brother-of-las-vegas-shooter-stephen-paddock-arrested-for-child-porn/

Adam Lanza’s Terrifying Online Life Revealed: Mass Shooting Spreadsheets, Columbine Collages, and Murder Tumblrs

https://www.thedailybeast.com/adam-lanzas-terrifying-online-life-revealed-mass-shooting-spreadsheets-columbine-collages-and-murder-tumblrs

Randall Drake: 5 Fast Facts You Need to Know

https://heavy.com/news/2017/10/randall-drake-explosives-suspect-note-dunedin/

Las Vegas Shooter’s Favorite Hooker Reveals Intimate Secrets

https://www.nationalenquirer.com/photos/las-vegas-shooter-paddock-sex-slave/
